sentence.Network_en: Has somebody helped himself to some film star's diamonds?
sentence.Network_cn: 有人偷了某个影星的钻石了吗?

sentence.Network_en: Somebody else lent me a pump and helped me mend the puncture.
sentence.Network_cn: 别人借给我一个打气筒，又帮我补好了轮胎。

sentence.Network_en: If I reduced somebody to tears I'd be mortified.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果我把谁弄哭了，我会尴尬的。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 词类_百度百科 ... pt. past tense( 过去)过去式 sb. somebody( 某人)某人 sth. something( 某事物)某物或某事.

means.word_mean: 名人,要人,大人物,伟大领袖,杰出的人,富豪

encyclopedia.content: 基本信息 歌名：Somebody 歌手：霍建华 专辑名称：《千金百分百》电视原声带 发行时间：2003-12-05 唱片公司：EMI 歌曲歌词 这世界太拥挤 常常会和理想过不去 也许 拐个弯走过去 强过硬着头皮心太急 也许 在明天的手里 走向那里 问着自己 大英雄都走过 名不经传的曾经 我一定会成somebody 我要做个somebody 我 我一定 闯出属于自己的天地 我一定会成somebody 我要做个somebody 我 我一定 不管明天晴天或下雨 这城市太冷静 少了一

entry.def: Somebody means the same as someone .

sentences.sentence: "there was too much for one person to do"

list.explanation: 严厉责骂某人，折磨，惹怒某人

example.en: He really ranks me out. What a pest!
example.zh: 他可真把我惹火了。真是个害人精!

example.en: He will rank you out for what happened.
example.zh: 为了那事，他会跟你闹个没完。

list.explanation: 非常喜欢某人，狂热地爱上某人

example.en: She has a crush on the new gym mistress.
example.zh: 她非常喜欢新来的女体育老师。

list.explanation: 阻挠、挫败(某人或某事)

example.en: The four would not be able to hang the entire juiy up.
example.zh: 那四个人不可能难倒整个陪审团的。

list.explanation: 击倒、打昏(某人)，伤害 (某人)

example.en: Bob dukcd out the mugger with a jab to the check.
example.zh: 鲍勃朝那行凶抢劫者的脸颊猛击一拳,把他打昏。

example.en: Dirk Hamilon duked himself out.
example.zh: 德克汉密顿结果伤了自已。

list.explanation: 以训诫或惩罚进行要挟某人

example.en: Why can' t Mayor Barry put the wood to school administrators and demand more caring than this?
example.zh: 为什么巴里市长不能以训诫方式要求学校当局多一点关注呢?

list.explanation: 不理睬某人，对某人冷淡

example.en: She was pretty snooty till we all put the chill on her.
example.zh: 她可真是高傲自大极了，直弄得我们大家都不理睬她。

example.en: I sent him a real snorter, because he really quite put the chill on me.
example.zh: 我寄给他一封措同极为严厉的信，因为他对我实在太冷淡了。

list.explanation: 杀死某人

example.en: Moyer had the chill put on Stein.
example.zh: 莫耶尔雇人杀死了斯坦因。

list.explanation: (无业游民用语)逮捕，监禁，下狱

example.en: I've boozed around this town for seven years，and I've not been sloughed up yet.
example.zh: 我在这镇上酗酒了七年，还从来没有被抓起来过。

example.en: Slough this jerk in the jail.
example.zh: 把这小子关进牢里。

list.explanation: 非常难应付的、不好对付的人(或事)

example.en: What a bitch of a day!
example.zh: 多么难熬的一天!

example.en: This is a bitch of a job.
example.zh: 这是件很不好办的事。

example.en: He is really a bitch of a boss.
example.zh: 他真是个难侍候的老板。

list.explanation: 辱骂、毁谤某人

example.en: They knocked around each other.
example.zh: 他们互相辱骂。

list.explanation: 呼唤(某人)，向(某人)打招呼或行礼

example.en: An old friend gave me a blow from the other side of the street.
example.zh: 一位老朋友在街道对面朝我打招呼。

list.explanation: 包庇某人，为某人开脱责任

example.en: He falls for Uona and winds up trying to get her off the hook.
example.zh: 他爱上了伊洛娜，最后竟想包庇她过关。

list.explanation: 向(某人)表示祝贺或欢迎

example.en: John put out his hand for me to give me five.
example.zh: 约翰向我伸出手来表示祝贺。

list.explanation: 助(某人)一臂之力，帮(某人)忙

example.en: Hey，give that guy five over here for a minute, will ya?
example.zh: 喂，你到这边来帮那个家伙一下，好吗？

list.explanation: (黑社会用语)向某人敲诈、勒索钱财

example.en: The hooligan puts peddlers on the stake monthly.
example.zh: 那地头蛇按月向小贩们强索保护费。

list.explanation: 突然使某人极度惊恐

example.en: The piano lid fell and scared the pants off my parents.
example.zh: 钢琴盖突然倒了下来，把我的爹妈吓了一大跳。

list.explanation: 向(某人)提出要求或考验，使(某人)不能轻易过关

example.en: We'll ask her a few questions just to keep her honest.
example.zh: 我们要问她几个问题，只是考验考验她。

list.explanation: (军队用语)向某人作简要介绍，通知某人

example.en: Poop me up so I know what's up here.
example.zh: 向我简单介绍一下，以便我弄清楚这里的情况。

list.explanation: 使某人生气，惹恼怒某人

example.en: What he did really browned me off.
example.zh: 他的所作所为确实让我气恼。

example.en: I'm afraid I'm going to brown off everyone，but here goes anyway.
example.zh: 恐怕我会得罪大家，但是不管怎么样，我还是得这么做.。

list.explanation: (对某人)产生强烈的爱或情欲

example.en: I'd never have the deep undying hots for that rah-rah boy.
example.zh: 对那个大学生，我永远也不会有深邃永恒的爱。

list.explanation: 对(某人)生气、怀恨、不满

example.en: Hatfmld had it in for McCoy.
example.zh: 哈特菲尔德对麦科伊十分不满。

list.explanation: 背叛或出卖某人乘人之危

example.en: It's my considered opinion, Yurochka, we've been sold down the river.
example.zh: 尤洛奇卡，经过反复思考，我认为我们已经是被人出卖了。

list.explanation: 欺骗、蒙骗(某人)

example.en: The boss really gave Wally the shaft.
example.zh: 老板确实是欺骗了书利。

list.explanation: 怠慢、亏待、拒绝(某人)

example.en: Somebody always gives me the shaft.
example.zh: 有人总是冷落我。

example.en: She gave him the shaft after he broke their date last weekend.
example.zh: 他上周末失约后, 她就跟他吹了。

list.explanation: 揣测某人的动机、举动，猜测、摸透某人的(心理)情况

example.en: The batter tried to psych out the pitcher, but it didn't work.
example.zh: 击球员竭力想捉摸出投球员的投球动向，可是没有用。

list.explanation: 使某人心情紧张、惊慌失措等

example.en: He won't psych me out as he did her.
example.zh: 他能唬住她，但吓唬不了我。

list.explanation: 试图探测出、估摸、调查发现 (某人的真相或底细)

example.en: I can't seem to suss Tom out. What a strange guy.
example.zh: 我好像没法捉摸出汤姆是什么样的人。真是个怪人。

list.explanation: 使某人经受磨难或磨炼，使某人受折磨，严格测试某事物

example.en: She's quite eager to try again,although they really ran her through the mill.
example.zh: 虽然他们把她折腾得够呛，但她还是想再试一次。

example.en: The new car was put through the mill.
example.zh: 这辆新车经过了严格测试。

list.explanation: 拒绝、冷落某人

example.en: Women are quick to put the freeze on freeloaders.
example.zh: 女人们很快会把那些白吃白喝的寄生虫甩掉的。

list.explanation: 把某人或某物击倒，痛击某人

example.en: We knocked the villain for a loop.
example.zh: 我们把那恶棍狠狠揍了一顿。

list.explanation: 使某人十分惊奇、诧异、剌激、非常快活

example.en: The news of their marriage threw me for a loop.
example.zh: 他俩结婚的消息让我十分诧异。

example.en: I don't believe this climactic sequence doesn't knock you for a loop.
example.zh: 我不相信这一连串的高潮都剌激不了你。

example.en: Wouldn't that knock the boys for a loop?
example.zh: 难道那还不能让那些孩子快活吗？

list.explanation: 使某人或某事陷入困境，使受到严重干扰

example.en: The whole economy was thrown for a loop.
example.zh: 整个经济陷入了困境。

example.en: It must have knocked him for a loop,but he asked.
example.zh: 这件事一定使他吃了大亏，但这是他自找的。

list.explanation: 把某人打得一败涂地，轻易地大败某人

example.en: That bum? The champ'll wipe up the floor with him.
example.zh: 那个家伙？冠军准会轻而易举地把他打得一败涂地。

example.en: Our team wiped the floor with the visiting team.
example.zh: 我队大胜了客队。

list.explanation: 使某人受尽折燃(尤指严加审问)，使某人历尽艰苦

example.en: Students asking for loans are really put through the wringer.
example.zh: 要求贷款的学生确实是备受刁难。

list.explanation: 对某人或某事物负有重担或重任的

example.en: I don't want to be saddled with your work.
example.zh: 我不想对你的工作有所承担。

list.explanation: 断然鄙弃、不接受(某人的某事物)

example.en: She told me rudely what to do with my proffered assistance.
example.zh: 她粗暴地断然拒绝了我提供的协助。

slang.tokens: play fast and loose with somebody

list.explanation: (对待某人或某事物)行为反复无常，处事轻率、忽冷忽热

example.en: He was playing fast and loose with his girlfriend. So she left him.
example.zh: 他对他的女友老是忽冷忽热，于是她离开了他。

list.explanation: 诈骗某人

example.en: That salesman tried to sell me a gotdbrick, but I just walked out on him.
example.zh: 那个推销员竭力想哄骗我,但我只是走开没理他。

auth_sentence.content: Hey, they probably stole it from somebody else!
auth_sentence.res_content: Hey, they probably stole it from somebody else!
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Hey, they probably stole it from somebody else!

auth_sentence.content: Call my layer, somebody is going to pay.
auth_sentence.res_content: Call my layer, somebody is going to pay.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Call my layer, somebody is going to pay.

auth_sentence.content: If somebody have an answer to my question pls.
auth_sentence.res_content: If somebody have an answer to my question pls.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: If somebody have an answer to my question pls.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 身体, 肉体, 人, 尸体
stems_affixes.word_buile: body身体,人→n.身体, 肉体, 人, 尸体

stems_affixes.value_cn: [用于否定句、疑问句、条件句]任何人, 重要人物, 无论谁;[肯定句]任何一个人

stems_affixes.word_buile: every每一的+body身体,人→pron.每一个人;每人,人人

stems_affixes.value_cn: 谁也不, 无人, 任何人, 没有任何人
stems_affixes.word_buile: no不,无+body身体,人→pron.谁也不, 无人, 任何人, 没有任何人

Sentence.sentence: He stood out in three ways－as a technologist, as a corporate （公司的）leader and as somebody who was able to make people love what had previously been impersonal, functional gadgets.
But of course there is also a kind of humorous satisfaction in seeing somebody self-important making a fool of themselves.

sentences.en: That must be somebody from the Ministry of Education.
sentences.cn: 那一定是教育部里的人。

sentences.en: Somebody has parked his car right in front of mine.
sentences.cn: 有人把他的汽车正好停在我的车子前面。

jushi.english: Somebody tried to gatecrash, didn't they?
jushi.chinese: 有人想无票入场,是不是?

jushi.english: That must be somebody from the Ministry of Education.
jushi.chinese: 那一定是教育部里的人。

jushi.english: Somebody has parked his car right in front of mine.
jushi.chinese: 有人将车子正好停在我的车子前面。
